name: Healer Simulator
description: Healer Simulator is an ultimate solution for healer trainig or just to have fun. Learn how to heal or warm up for the raid.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3+ Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Althon X2 2.7 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI or Nvidia graphics card with 512MB video ram or better and Shader Model 3.0+ support. (ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or higher) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
